quote: Train to bring awareness back every time it drifts away. Be relentless with this practice.
Put your phone away. In a drawer or in a box. Tell yourself to only look at it once an hour. This is not difficult to do. The question is whether you really want to do it or not

Many people are alive but don’t touch the miracle of being alive.
If you knew what I know about the power of giving you would not let a single meal pass without sharing it in some way.
What you think, you become. What you feel, you attract. What you imagine, you create.
No matter who you are, no matter what you did, no matter where you’ve come from, you can always change, become a better version of yourself.

Things do not grow better; they remain as they are. It is we who grow better, by the changes we make in ourselves.

Withdraw your energy from people in your life who are inherently energy vampires. Practice being affectionately detached with them but always kind, gentle, sincere and loving towards them.

As soon as we control where awareness goes, we control where energy flows. As soon as we control where the energy is flowing, we control what is manifesting in our life. And meditation is the art and science of directing awareness.
